div.class: fsDiv fsStyleOneThird fsStyleColumn fsStyleColumn-2 fsStyleColumn-last fsStyleAutoclear

div.noscript: You must have JavaScript enabled in your web browser to use the media player.

h5.span: Mike Thomas, Superintendent of Schools | Mayor Robert F. Sullivan

span.em:
The Brockton Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, age, sex, veteran’s status, sexual orientation,
gender identity or disability in admission to, access to, treatment in or employment in its programs and activities.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p:
CLIQUEZ SUR LE BOUTON PLAY POUR HAITIAN CREOLE
CLIQUE NO BOTÃO PLAY PARA PORTUGUÊS
HAGA CLIC EN EL BOTÓN PLAY PARA ESPAÑOL
Although our registration office is physically closed due to the COVID-19 crisis, we are pleased to inform you that we are now conducting virtual registrations.
div.h3: Please complete the pre-registration form below:

Once your pre-registration form is complete, you will be placed in the queue for one of our registration specialists to contact you. Please be patient as we are trying to accommodate all families with this new remote registration process. If you have an urgent concern or question please email the director at MAS@bpsma.org

p.span: We are currently registering the following:
Children who are new to Brockton for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year
Children who are eligible for Kindergarten (age 5 by August 31, 2020) for the 2020 - 2021 school year
Children who are eligible for the Pre-Kindergarten Full Day Lottery (with a birth date of 9/1/15 to 12/31/15).

span.strong: All other registrations for the 2020-2021 school year will be completed in July and August 2020.

div.p: We will all get through this together.
We are Brockton, the City of Champions!
